import {IssuerBadge, Credential} from './obj_helpers';
 
export const getIssuerBadge = (req, res, next) => {
    req.body.toCreate = new IssuerBadge(
        req.params.address, req.body.description, req.body.name, 
        req.body.image, req.body.version
    );
    next();
}
 
export const getCredentialToIssue = (req, res, next) => {
    req.body.toIssue = new Credential(
        req.body.name, req.body.recipient, req.body.expires
    );
    next();
}
